text.__SUMMARY__: Ampelopsis glandulosa is a species of plant native to China, Japan, India, Nepal, Myanmar, Vietnam, and the Philippines.
text.Varieties:
Several varieties are distinguished:
var. hancei
var. kulingensis
var. glandulosa
var. heterophylla
var. brevipedunculata
text.Cultivation:
Ampelopsis glandulosa is used as an ornamental plant in gardens.
